shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a specific remote user enables/disables the video module.
Occurs when a specific remote user enables/disables the video module.

dlentry.dd:
Deprecated as of v2.9.0. Deprecated as of v2.9.0. This callback is deprecated, please use instead: This callback is deprecated, please use instead:
(0) and (5). (0) and (5).
(2) and (6). (2) and (6).

section.p: The SDK triggers this callback when the remote user resumes or stops capturing the video stream by calling the method. The SDK triggers this callback when the remote user resumes or stops capturing the video stream by calling the method.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user sending the video stream. The user ID of the remote user sending the video stream.

pd.p:
Occurs when a specific remote user enables/disables the video module. Occurs when a specific remote user enables/disables the video module.
: Enabled. : Enabled. Other users in the channel can see the video of this remote user. Other users in the channel can see the video of this remote user.
: Disabled. : Disabled. Other users in the channel can no longer receive the video stream from this remote user, while this remote user can still receive the video streams from other users. Other users in the channel can no longer receive the video stream from this remote user, while this remote user can still receive the video streams from other users.
